title: LSU AD on Kiffin early returns and leading LSU Tiger Athletics
body_text:
LSU AD on Kiffin’s early returns and leading LSU Tiger Athletics
BATON ROUGE, La. (WAFB) - New LSU athletic director Verge Ausberry sat down with WAFB-TV sports director Jacques Doucet for a special one-on-one spanning nearly 43 minutes.
Ausberry discussed LSU football and their new head coach Lane Kiffin, as the Tigers have attacked the transfer portal and have built plenty of excitement towards Kiffin’s first season with LSU in 2026.
Ausberry also shared his thoughts on the struggling LSU men’s basketball program, supporting the powerhouse LSU baseball, and women’s basketball teams, and much, much more.
